general.gigTitle: do website development as full stack web developer, PHP laravel HTML CSS react

sellerCard.description: Greetings! I'm a professional Full-stack Web Developer, having 3+ years of experience in the field of web development. I've an extensive years of experience building smooth, secure, scalable web and mobile apps. I make use of the latest technologies like php, laravel, nodejs, reactjs, nestjs, nextjs, typescript, mongodb, postgresql to build your web and mobile apps. Let's connect today and get a good solution.

description.content:
Are you looking for a full-stack developer who is experienced in PHP Laravel and modern frontend technology such as Reactjs, Nextjs, or Vuejs to build a custom web application for your business or services?


Then you are at the right place.


I'm a full-stack web developer or software developer with years of extensive experience designing and developing modern websites for startups or established businesses to add value. I can create a high-quality, reliable, and scalable application for you and resolve any issues you are experiencing.


Frontend:

HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React JS, Next JS, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, Material UI, Chakra


Backend:

PHP Laravel, Node JS, Express JS


Databases:

MongoDB, PostgreSQL, SQLite, MySQL


State Management:

Redux, Redux Toolkit, Context API, Zustand, React Query


What I Offer:


  • Figma Design to Interactive Website
  • REST APIs Integration & Development
  • Ecommerce Application Development
  • CMS Development
  • Payment Gateways Integration
  • And More


Why Me:


  • Fast Delivery
  • Quality Of Work
  • Unlimited Revisions
  • Creative Solutions
  • Clean And Commented Code


Ready to get started? Inbox me, and let's bring your vision to reality.

slide.name: do website development as full stack web developer, PHP laravel HTML CSS react

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will the website be mobile friendly?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Without a doubt. Responsive services are included in all packages.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide help or revisions after the job has been completed?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I am providing 30 days of ongoing support to you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need from me to design my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will need your Webflow login credentials and some initial instructions to get started. You need to provide the design files(figma, sketch or reference websites), logos, photos, text, fonts, and other relevant files.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is the price fixed or negotiable?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! I believe in a personalized approach to pricing. First, let's discuss the specific challenges your website is facing. Once I understand your needs, I'll provide you with a tailored solution and a fair quote that aligns with the project's scope.

packageList.title: Basic Landing Page Web App
packageList.description: Landing Page or Homepage Web Application Design & Development + Upto 5 Sections

packageList.title: Mid Scale Web App Frontend
packageList.description: Design & Development Medium Scale Static Web Application + Upto  5 Pages or Figma to React, Nextjs

packageList.title: Premium Web Application
packageList.description: Upto  8 Pages Premium Web App + eCommerce Functionality + Provided API Integration + Basic SEO + Soc

openGraph.title: do website development as full stack web developer, PHP laravel HTML CSS react

reviews.comment: Abu H did a great job designing the front-end of a website for us, a medical expert group, with the required attention to detail to make the page look professional, easy to navigate, and visually appealing; we trust that the development of the back-end will be equally satisfactory

seller_response.comment:
Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us. It's nice to hear you're happy with our work.

I always try to deliver my best for my clients. Looking forward to working with you in the next phase of back-end development.

Thank you!

reviews.comment: He performed excellently in finishing the website changes that I required. The task was completed in no time. I would endorse him for his programming skills and for providing excellent value for my investment. Thank you.

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your valuable feedback. It was a pleasure to work with you.

reviews.comment: Working with Abu was a FANTASTIC experience in website development. His PROFESSIONALISM, quick responsiveness, and stellar communication skills truly exceeded expectations, along with delivering top-notch work and detailed documentation. Thank you, Abu, for your amazing cooperation and coding skills â€“ you deserve all the praise! ðŸ™Œ

seller_response.comment:
Thanks for your appreciation, Boris. It really meant a lot to me. And I'm really happy to know that you're satisfied with my work.

I will be much happier to work with you on another project in the future.

Thank you once again!

reviews.comment: I believe I have discovered a new favorite UI/UX designer. I appreciate the excellent work and prompt turnaround time. I look forward to collaborating with you again.

seller_response.comment: I truly appreciate your confidence in my work. Looking forward to collaborating again in the future.

reviews.comment: He did an outstanding job with impressive attention to detail and extensive knowledge. He was very courteous, quick to respond, and truly went the extra mile to deliver excellent results. I strongly recommend working with him!

seller_response.comment: Thanks for the kind and Inspiring words, your words make me work even harder.
